RelatedSentence: Yechimovich : BOI Gave Govt an NIS 18 Billion ' Slap in the Face ' A Bank of Israel report about budget shortfalls is a ' huge slap in the face ' to the government , former Opposition leader insists .

A0: the Face ' A Bank of Israel report
RelatedSentence: If Israel is to remain solvent , taxes have to go up , and the government has to cut back , the Bank of Israel said Monday .
That announcement , said Labor MK Shelly Yechimovich , was a huge slap in the face to the government of Binyamin Netanyahu and Yair Lapid .
In its announcement , the BOI said that Israel had no choice but to cut NIS 18 billion from its budget .

A0: the Face ' A Bank of Israel report
RelatedSentence: In its semi-annual fiscal survey of the Israeli economy , the Bank said that the government had overstepped its budget significantly in funding several programs , and negotiating contracts with public workers .

In its semi-annual fiscal survey of the Israeli economy , the Bank said that the government had overstepped its budget significantly in funding several programs , and negotiating contracts with public workers .
What that means , Yechimovich said , is that the middle class dream of Netanyahu and Lapid has evaporated .
Already many Israeli small businesses are empty of customers because people do not have money to buy as growth slows .
It is the poor and the middle class who will pay for the mistakes of this government , Yechimovich said .
They must pay for health and education from their pockets , while the ' tycoons ' make out like bandits , with huge government gifts .
The gap between promises made by politicians and the sad reality has never been greater , she added .
